data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 126,491 believers in Bijie, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bijie, Guizhou, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Bijie, Guizhou, China find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Bijie, Guizhou, China that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Bijie, Guizhou, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, sanctify the 126,491 believers in Bijie and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Bijie prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Bijie, Guizhou, China from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

location.name: Bijie
